00032 #ifndef __LIBCFS_HEAP_H__
00033 #define __LIBCFS_HEAP_H__
00034 
00066 struct cfs_binheap_node {
00068         unsigned int    chn_index;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #define CBH_SHIFT       9
00072 #define CBH_SIZE       (1 << CBH_SHIFT)             /* # ptrs per level */
00073 #define CBH_MASK       (CBH_SIZE - 1)
00074 #define CBH_NOB        (CBH_SIZE * sizeof(struct cfs_binheap_node *))
00075 
00076 #define CBH_POISON      0xdeadbeef
00077 
00081 enum {
00082         CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW    = 1,
00083 };
00084 
00085 struct cfs_binheap;
00086 
00090 struct cfs_binheap_ops {
00102         int             (*hop_enter)(struct cfs_binheap *h,
00103                                      struct cfs_binheap_node *e);
00112         void            (*hop_exit)(struct cfs_binheap *h,
00113                                     struct cfs_binheap_node *e);
00130         int             (*hop_compare)(struct cfs_binheap_node *a,
00131                                        struct cfs_binheap_node *b);
00132 };
00133 
00139 struct cfs_binheap {
00141         struct cfs_binheap_node  ****cbh_elements3;
00143         struct cfs_binheap_node   ***cbh_elements2;
00145         struct cfs_binheap_node    **cbh_elements1;
00147         unsigned int            cbh_nelements;
00149         unsigned int            cbh_hwm;
00151         unsigned int            cbh_flags;
00153         struct cfs_binheap_ops *cbh_ops;
00155         void                   *cbh_private;
00157         struct cfs_cpt_table   *cbh_cptab;
00159         int                     cbh_cptid;
00160 };
00161 
00162 void cfs_binheap_destroy(struct cfs_binheap *h);
00163 struct cfs_binheap *
00164 cfs_binheap_create(struct cfs_binheap_ops *ops, unsigned int flags,
00165                    unsigned count, void *arg, struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab,
00166                    int cptid);
00167 struct cfs_binheap_node *
00168 cfs_binheap_find(struct cfs_binheap *h, unsigned int idx);
00169 int cfs_binheap_insert(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e);
00170 void cfs_binheap_remove(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e);
00171 void cfs_binheap_relocate(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e);
00172 
00173 static inline int
00174 cfs_binheap_size(struct cfs_binheap *h)
00175 {
00176         return h->cbh_nelements;
00177 }
00178 
00179 static inline int
00180 cfs_binheap_is_empty(struct cfs_binheap *h)
00181 {
00182         return h->cbh_nelements == 0;
00183 }
00184 
00185 static inline struct cfs_binheap_node *
00186 cfs_binheap_root(struct cfs_binheap *h)
00187 {
00188         return cfs_binheap_find(h, 0);
00189 }
00190 
00191 static inline struct cfs_binheap_node *
00192 cfs_binheap_remove_root(struct cfs_binheap *h)
00193 {
00194         struct cfs_binheap_node *e = cfs_binheap_find(h, 0);
00195 
00196         if (e != NULL)
00197                 cfs_binheap_remove(h, e);
00198         return e;
00199 }
00200 
00203 #endif /* __LIBCFS_HEAP_H__ */
